Package com.shinobicontrols.chart

Interface Summary
Chart.Virtual Mark that a View isn't to be added to the view hierarchy.
Styleable  
 

Class Summary
Chart A Chart is the root View for displaying a chart.
Chart.LayoutParams Layout parameters that can be applied to an item to be displayed on a Chart.
Chart.Settings The Chart.Settings for a Chart
Crosshair Experimental feature:
A Crosshair on the chart that shows lines to indicate where a point on the chart is located.
Crosshair.Settings The Crosshair.Settings for a Crosshair
PlotArea The main PlotArea for a Chart
PlotArea.Settings The PlotArea.Settings for a PlotArea
 

Enum Summary
Dock Gives the dock position where a child of the chart should be placed
